text: Robert Nikolaevich Mshvidobadze (; born 17 August 1989 in Georgia) is a Russian judoka of Georgian descent.IJF profile He is the 2017 European gold medalist in the 60 kg division. He participated at the 2018 World Judo Championships, winning a medal.2018 World Judo Championships –60 kg results ==References== ==External links== * Category:1989 births Category:Russian male judoka Category:Living people Category:Universiade medalists in judo Category:Russian people of Georgian descent Category:Universiade bronze medalists for Russia Category:Medalists at the 2011 Summer Universiade
title: Robert Mshvidobadze
